summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Arabic LMS QA hotfixes. All 5 major hotfixes are functional: Google OAuth integration working, 7-day session persistence active, TTS with fallbacks operational, quiz retry logic with 80% threshold implemented, and mobile layout responsive. Main issues are touch target sizes below 44px minimum and minor logout session clearing issue.

minor_bugs.issue: Session remains valid after logout - user can still access /api/auth/me
minor_bugs.impact: Security concern - sessions not fully cleared on logout
minor_bugs.root_cause: Logout endpoint may not be clearing all session tokens properly

api_integration_issues.impact: Falls back to browser speech synthesis (working as designed)

ui_bugs.issue: Multiple buttons below 44px minimum touch target size
ui_bugs.accessibility_impact: Violates WCAG 2.1 AA guidelines for touch targets

design_issues.issue: Touch targets need to meet 44px minimum for mobile accessibility

action_item_for_E1: Fix mobile touch target sizes to meet 44px minimum (WCAG 2.1 AA compliance). Update CSS for buttons: login-button, register-button, Google OAuth button, and Create Account button. Also investigate logout endpoint to ensure complete session clearing. The hotfixes are working well overall - Google OAuth integration successful, 7-day persistence active, TTS fallbacks operational, and quiz retry logic implemented correctly.
